Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_9670zjaj&referenceId=1_9670zjaj&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: Investors breathe a sigh of relief as rising inflation was not worse than feared and look ahead to the U.S. earnings season, which kicks off with JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup. U.S. President Joe Biden gives a COVID-19 response update. The White House will meet executives from Apple, Amazon, IBM to discuss software security. Plus, supply chain issues plague U.S. consumers ahead of expected wintry weather.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3rccO9i
